H0.text: Which of the United States of America is known as the Old Colony State. Virginia

H2.text: Which of the United States of America is known as the Old Colony State. Pennsylvania

H3.text: Which of the United States of America is known as the Old Colony State. Mass.

A4.text: Massachusetts was one of the original 13 colonies of the United States.
